sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a4a051c4db59270050479eb6db9619e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_task">request_item.cat_item.category=083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c^EQ<item display_table="sc_category" display_value="OCIO Internal Request" endquery="false" field="request_item.cat_item.category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR Call CI-SCTASK</name><order>1000</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

//copy attachment from RITM record to sc task
//copy Description from RITM record to sc task
//copy CI field from Call record to sc task
var CallRec = new GlideRecord('new_call');
CallRec.addQuery('transferred_to',current.request_item.request);					
CallRec.query();
if(CallRec.next()) {
current.cmdb_ci= CallRec.u_cmdb_ci;
			  }
	
var RITM_Rec = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
RITM_Rec.addQuery('sys_id',current.request_item);					
RITM_Rec.query();
if(RITM_Rec.next()) {
current.description=RITM_Rec.variables.Description;
}			  

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKO</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-17 03:46:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a4a051c4db59270050479eb6db9619e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR Call CI-SCTASK</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a4a051c4db59270050479eb6db9619e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-17 03:56:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a4a051c4db59270050479eb6db9619e5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_e9bb8104db59270050479eb6db9619c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>SC_request_item.inserted.call_rec</event_name><name>Copy Call record attachment-RITM</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var gr_RITM= new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
gr_RITM.addQuery('sys_id',event.parm1);
gr_RITM.query();
if(gr_RITM.next()){
	 
var callRec = new GlideRecord('new_call');
callRec.addQuery('transferred_to',gr_RITM.request);					
callRec.query();
if(callRec.next()) {
var sourceSysID =callRec.sys_id+'';
var targetSysID = gr_RITM.sys_id+'';
			
var copyAtt = new GlideSysAttachment();			
copyAtt.copy('new_call',sourceSysID,'sc_req_item',targetSysID);
	
			  }	
	
}
]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKO</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-17 03:26:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>e9bb8104db59270050479eb6db9619c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy Call record attachment-RITM</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_e9bb8104db59270050479eb6db9619c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-17 03:26:31</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</name><script><![CDATA[var OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details = Class.create();
OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
//Populate Call record details to the catalog for New calls. Its called by Client scripts from 
	
	    call_info: function() {
		var CallRecord = this.getParameter('sysparam_CallRecord');
		var cart_item = this.getParameter('sysparam_cart_item');	
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		var call_details = new GlideRecord('new_call');
		call_details.addQuery('sys_id',CallRecord);
		call_details.query();
		if(call_details.next())
			{
var copyAtt = new GlideSysAttachment();			
copyAtt.copy('new_call',call_details.sys_id,'sc_cart_item',cart_item);
				result.setAttribute("call_short_desc",call_details.short_description);
			    result.setAttribute("call_req_for", call_details.u_requested_for);
				result.setAttribute("call_req_by", call_details.caller);
				result.setAttribute("call_im_req_for", call_details.company);
				result.setAttribute("call_description", call_details.description);


				
			}
	},

	
    type: 'OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 22:00:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-18 04:19:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_f44b75e7db28ab4050479eb6db96193a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="General Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Get Call record data on load</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {


var call_record = getParmVal('sysparm_call_record');
var cart_item =g_form.getParameter("sysparm_item_guid");
var ga = new GlideAjax("OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details");
ga.addParam("sysparm_name","call_info");
ga.addParam("sysparam_CallRecord",call_record);
ga.addParam("sysparam_cart_item",cart_item);

ga.getXML(ajaxResponse);	
  
}

function getParmVal(name){
    var url = document.URL.parseQuery();
    if(url[name]){
        return decodeURI(url[name]);
    }
    else{
        return;
    }
}	

	function ajaxResponse(serverResponse) {
	var result = serverResponse.responseXML.getElementsByTagName("result");
	var call_req_for = result[0].getAttribute("call_req_for");
	var call_req_by = result[0].getAttribute("call_req_by");
	var call_short_desc=result[0].getAttribute("call_short_desc");
	var call_im_req_for= result[0].getAttribute("call_im_req_for");
	var call_description= result[0].getAttribute("call_description");
		
		
	g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',call_req_for);
	g_form.setValue('Short_Description',call_short_desc);
	g_form.setValue('u_requested_by',call_req_by);
	g_form.setValue('u_organization',call_im_req_for);
	g_form.setValue('Description',call_description);	
			

	}
	
   
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 21:05:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f44b75e7db28ab4050479eb6db96193a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Call record data on load</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f44b75e7db28ab4050479eb6db96193a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-18 04:19:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Get Call record data on load

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item.category=083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c^EQ<item display_table="sc_category" display_value="OCIO Internal Request" endquery="false" field="cat_item.category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR copy attachment-RITM</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {


var task_sys_id=current.sys_id;
gs.eventQueue('SC_request_item.inserted.call_rec',current, task_sys_id,'');

gr_SCTASK.addQuery('sys_id',event.parm1);

if(gr_SCTASK.next()){
	 
var RitmRec = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');

RitmRec.query();
if(RitmRec.next()) {
var sourceSysID =RitmRec.sys_id+'';

var copyAtt = new GlideSysAttachment();			
copyAtt.copy('sc_req_item',sourceSysID,'sc_task',targetSysID);
			  }	
	
}
]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKO</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-17 03:37:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>158e4d44db59270050479eb6db961946</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy Call record attachment-SC_Task</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_158e4d44db59270050479eb6db961946</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-17 03:46:12</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>
This Business rule is to trigger system email notification when a request is created(Opened), closed complete and closed incomple. </description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR SC_request.inserted.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

		if((current.u_item_notify_requested_for == true) && (current.u_item_requested_for != current.caller_id)){
			gs.eventQueue("SC_request.inserted.notify_CSC", current, current.u_item_requested_for, current.u_item_requested_for.first_name);}
			
		if((current.u_item_notify_requested_by == true) && (current.u_item_requested_by != current.caller_id)){
			gs.eventQueue("SC_request.inserted.notify_CSC", current, current.u_item_requested_by, current.u_item_requested_by.first_name);	
		
	
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-18 20:50:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR SC_request.inserted.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>NKUMAR</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-22 17:02:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948"/></record_update>
